info.description: API to create, update and retrieve details for a new Customer that is being onboarded
info.title: Customer on boarding

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

parameters.name: validate_only
parameters.description: The identifier to indicate if it is set to only validate or not.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

parameters.name: validate_only
parameters.description: The identifier to indicate if it is set to only validate or not.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

id.description: The Identifier of the record created

uniqueIdentifier.description: The unique identifier/Message Reference of the record created.

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

requestParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the request by IRIS

responseParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

displayNames.description: Contains the name used for display or enrichment purposes

displayName.description: Contains the name used for display or enrichment purposes

phoneNumber.description: The phone number of the customer or prospect

smsNumber.description: The mobile SMS number of the customer

communicationType.description: Communication type to the customer, as defined by the institution. E.g. Proposal, Alert, Campaign, New Product Update, Robinson List, Statement.

preferredChannel.description: Preferred method of contact to the customer

faxIds.description: The fax (facsimile) number of the customer

faxId.description: The fax (facsimile) number of the customer

officePhoneNumbers.description: The office phone number of the customer

officePhoneNumber.description: The office phone number of the customer

streets.description: Contains the first line of customer's base address, example building number, street number etc.

street.description: Contains the first line of customer's base address, example building number, street number etc.

addressCities.description: The town and/or city component of the base address of a customer

addressCity.description: The town and/or city component of the base address of a customer

countries.description: Identifies the country of the customer.

country.description: Identifies the country of the customer.

legalId.description: Unique reference number of the legal documents submitted as identification proof

legalDocumentName.description: Name of the legal documents such as passport, driving licence etc., provided as identification proof

legalHolderName.description: Name of the account holder in the Legal Document

legalIssueAuthorisedDate.description: Authority who issued the legal document

legalIssueDate.description: Date of Issue of the legal document

legalExpiredDate.description: Expiry date of the legal document submitted as proof

employJobTitle.description: Employment Job Title of the Customer

employStartDate.description: Starting date of the customer's employment

salaryCurrency.description: Currency in which the Salary information of the customer is maintained

salaryAmount.description: Gross Salary details of the customer

residenceStatus.description: Residence Status of the Customer for CRM purpose like Owner, Tenant, Householder, Nester etc.

residenceSince.description: The date since the user has obtained the residence.

residenceType.description: Residence type of the customer like Farmhouse, Independent house, Residential Apartment, Serviced Apartments

residenceValue.description: Market Value of the customer's residence

residenceMortgageValue.description: Mortgage value of the residence property of the customer

jointRelationCode.description: The identifier of the relationship between joint holder and owner

reverseJointRelationCode.description: Relationship code for the Related Customer

jointRelationRoleId.description: Role of joint customer with the main customer

postingRestrictIds.description: Identifies any restrictions for posting entries that are imposed on a Customer

postingRestrictId.description: Identifies any restrictions for posting entries that are imposed on a Customer

contactType.description: Types of contacts available to users to communicate

language.description: The language that the contents of the field are displayed in.

dateOfBirth.description: The date of birth of an individual customer

customerStatus.description: The internal bank status of a customer

customerMnemonic.description: Specifies an alternative easy means of referencing the Customer

nationalityId.description: The identifier of the nationality of a customer

residenceId.description: The identifier of the country of residence of a customer

accountOfficerId.description: The identifier of the department head or specific account officer responsible for the customer

industryId.description: An institution-defined identifier of the industry in which the customer is trading, operating or is associated with

target.description: Specifies how the Customer is considered by the bank and how he fits in with the Account Officer's overall marketing strategy

sectorId.description: An institution-defined identifier of the type of customer

customerCompany.description: Branch of the customer. Accepts the id of the COMPANY which shares customer with currently signed in company

customerLiability.description: Indicates the customer consolidation number for credit grouping purposes, within the same branch/country.

postCode.description: Identifies the address postal code for the customer.

contactDate.description: Date that first contact was made with the Customer.

introducer.description: Name of the person who introduced the Customer to the bank

kycRelationship.description: Indicates the Customer Relationship details of the customer

isKycComplete.description: Whether information related to the customer has been collected and verified

kycLastReviewDate.description: Date customer KYC information was last reviewed

kycNextSystemReviewDate.description: Date system has calculated customer should next be reviewed.

kycNextReviewDate.description: Next date of KYC review defined manually by the User

amlCheck.description: Describe the legal controls that is required by institutions to prevent or report Anti Money Laundering activities. It can have YES, SENT or NULL values.

amlResult.description: Describe the results of Anti Money Laundering.

amlLastResultDate.description: The last date when Anti Money Laundering result is performed and updated

title.description: Main menu title or header which the user wants to display on the screen when requesting the display of this main menu. This field can be expanded to allow the user to enter the description of the main menu in various languages.

isSecureMessage.description: If 'Yes', then the customer will receive a SECURE message.

lastName.description: The last name of an individual customer

birthIncorpDate.description: Date on which the entity is incorporated

manualRiskClass.description: Customer's risk class updated manually by the User overriding the risk class calculated by the KYC process

overrideReason.description: Reason for changing the customer's risk class from the calculated risk class.

customerType.description: Illustrates the capacity in which a client is acting.Possible Values : Customer, Broker, Depository, Client, Counterparty, External Account Manager

id.description: The Identifier of the record created

uniqueIdentifier.description: The unique identifier/Message Reference of the record created.

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

requestParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the request by IRIS

responseParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

code.description: The code related to override message.

options.description: The usable options for the override.
